citations.narrative:
In five of the dog enclosures, there were plastic water buckets with chew damage and discoloration on the top rim.
Water buckets that have chew damage make it difficult to properly clean and sanitize the receptacle which can expose the
dogs to potential disease hazards.
Water receptacles must be kept clean and sanitized in accordance with Sec. 3.11(b) of this subpart.
Correct by : 02/22/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.10(c) 
   
Watering 
In five of the dog enclosures, there were plastic water buckets with chew damage and discoloration on the top rim.  
Water buckets that have chew damage make it difficult to properly clean and sanitize the receptacle which can expose the 
dogs to potential disease hazards.  
Water receptacles must be kept clean and sanitized in accordance with Sec. 3.11(b) of this subpart. 
Correct by : 02/22/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
